* Desmonus caught the threatening look Bloodystrike gave Reptilica and 
simply sighes, her optics narrowed and her back a little stiff.
Were all men like this?
Greedy little switch board who want everything to themselves.
If that was true then the opisit sex from her was obviously doomed to 
extinction.
But she simply went along as planned.*

" Hmm...I think his manners are just fine, Bloodystrike. Just as yours are."

* But then Desmonuss temper was just about getting as short as the men 
around hers was.
She simply let go of their hands and crossed her arms, but keeping in step 
with them.
She would put them in their places.*

" Really, gentlemen...this scuabbling between you too is really getting 
tiresome..."
